info.title: Luma Public API
info.description:
Luma API allows you to programmatically manage events, guests, calendars, people, ticket types, coupons, images, and more.

Getting Started

- Base URL: https://public-api.luma.com
- Requirements: Luma Plus subscription
- Authentication: Include your API key in the x-luma-api-key header

Rate Limits

- GET endpoints: 500 requests per 5 minutes per calendar
- POST endpoints: 100 requests per 5 minutes per calendar (separate from GET limit)
- Block duration: 1 minute when limit is exceeded
- On limit exceed: 429 Too Many Requests

API Formats

- Dates: ISO 8601 (e.g., 2022-10-04T05:20:00.000Z), returned in UTC
- Durations: ISO 8601 duration (e.g., P1DT12H30M)
- Locations: Google Maps Place IDs

Route Versioning

- Per-route versioning (e.g., /v1/... and /v2/... can coexist)
- Enables gradual migration and isolated changes per endpoint

Code Examples

- Demo Basketball Club example: https://github.com/luma-team/basketball-club-example

Support

- For higher limits or questions: support@luma.com

tags.name: Getting Started
tags.description: Make your first request in minutes. Authenticate using x-luma-api-key.

tags.name: API Formats
tags.description: Dates and durations use ISO 8601. All times are UTC. Locations use Google Maps Place IDs.

tags.name: Rate Limits
tags.description: GET: 500/5min/calendar, POST: 100/5min/calendar. 429 when exceeded; 1 minute block.

tags.name: API Conventions
tags.description: Per-route versioning, endpoint-specific versions, backwards compatibility.

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Create, update, retrieve events and event-level resources (guests, coupons, ticket types).

tags.name: Coupons
tags.description: Manage coupons at event and calendar scope.

tags.name: Person Tags
tags.description: Create, update, delete, and apply person tags within calendars.

tags.name: Entities
tags.description: Lookup entities by ID or slug.

get.description:
Retrieves detailed information for a single event by its ID.

Parameters

| Name | In    | Type   | Required | Description                  |
|------|-------|--------|----------|------------------------------|
| id   | query | string | Yes      | ID of the event to retrieve. |

post.description:
Creates a new event in the Luma system.

Headers

| Name           | Value                |
|----------------|----------------------|
| Accept         | application/json     |
| Content-Type   | application/json     |
| x-luma-api-key | Your API key         |

Request Body

- The full schema is not provided in the source. Typical fields include: `name`, `start_time` (ISO 8601), `duration` (ISO 8601 duration), `location` (Google Place ID), etc.

Updates properties of an existing event. Include only the fields you wish to change.

Request Body

| Name       | Type   | Required | Description                                           |
|------------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| id         | string | Yes      | ID of the event to update.                            |
| name       | string | No       | New name for the event.                               |
| start_time | string | No       | New start time in ISO 8601 format (UTC).              |
| duration   | string | No       | New duration in ISO 8601 duration format.             |
| location   | string | No       | Updated location (Google Maps Place ID recommended).  |

get.description:
Retrieves detailed information for a single guest by its ID.

Parameters

| Name | In    | Type   | Required | Description                  |
|------|-------|--------|----------|------------------------------|
| id   | query | string | Yes      | ID of the guest to retrieve. |

Retrieves a list of all guests associated with a specific event.

Parameters

| Name     | In    | Type   | Required | Description                             |
|----------|-------|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------|
| event_id | query | string | Yes      | ID of the event to list guests for.     |

post.description:
Updates the attendance status of a guest for an event.

Request Body

| Name     | Type   | Required | Description                                                         |
|----------|--------|----------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
| status   | string | Yes      | New guest status (e.g., accepted, declined).                        |
| guest_id | string | No       | ID of the guest to update. Likely required; see full API reference. |
| event_id | string | No       | ID of the event (if required by your integration).                  |

Sends invitation emails to specified guests for a given event.

Request Body

| Name      | Type           | Required | Description                               |
|-----------|----------------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
| event_id  | string         | Yes      | ID of the event to send invites for.      |
| guest_ids | array[string]  | Yes      | Guest IDs to send invitations to.         |

Adds one or more new guests to a specified event.

Request Body

| Name     | Type            | Required | Description                              |
|----------|-----------------|----------|------------------------------------------|
| event_id | string          | Yes      | ID of the event to add guests to.        |
| guests   | array[object]   | Yes      | Array of guest objects (name, email).    |

Adds a host to a specified event.

Request Body

| Name     | Type   | Required | Description                                                                 |
|----------|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| event_id | string | Yes      | ID of the event to add a host to.                                          |
| host     | object | Yes      | Either existing host reference (id) or new host details (name, email).      |

get.description:
Retrieves all coupons associated with a specific event.

Parameters

| Name     | In    | Type   | Required | Description                           |
|----------|-------|--------|----------|---------------------------------------|
| event_id | query | string | Yes      | ID of the event to list coupons for.  |

post.description:
Creates a new coupon for a specified event.

Request Body

| Name            | Type   | Required | Description                                          |
|-----------------|--------|----------|------------------------------------------------------|
| event_id        | string | Yes      | ID of the event to associate the coupon with.        |
| code            | string | Yes      | Unique coupon code.                                  |
| discount_amount | number | Yes      | Amount to discount in USD.                           |
| expires_at      | string | No       | Expiration in ISO 8601 (UTC).                        |

Updates properties of an existing event coupon.

Request Body

| Name            | Type   | Required | Description                            |
|-----------------|--------|----------|----------------------------------------|
| id              | string | Yes      | ID of the coupon to update.            |
| code            | string | No       | New unique coupon code.                |
| discount_amount | number | No       | Updated discount amount in USD.        |
| expires_at      | string | No       | New expiration in ISO 8601 (UTC).      |

get.description:
Retrieves all ticket types associated with a specific event.

Parameters

| Name     | In    | Type   | Required | Description                               |
|----------|-------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
| event_id | query | string | Yes      | ID of the event to list ticket types for. |

Retrieves detailed information for a single ticket type by its ID.

Parameters

| Name | In    | Type   | Required | Description                         |
|------|-------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| id   | query | string | Yes      | ID of the ticket type to retrieve. |

post.description:
Creates a new ticket type under a specified event.

Request Body

| Name     | Type   | Required | Description                                      |
|----------|--------|----------|--------------------------------------------------|
| event_id | string | Yes      | ID of the event to associate the ticket type.   |
| name     | string | Yes      | Name of the new ticket type.                    |
| price    | number | No       | Price in USD (required for paid tickets).       |
| type     | string | No       | Ticket type (e.g., free, paid).                 |

Updates properties of an existing ticket type.

Request Body

| Name  | Type   | Required | Description                               |
|-------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
| id    | string | Yes      | ID of the ticket type to update.          |
| name  | string | No       | New name for the ticket type.             |
| price | number | No       | New price for the ticket type in USD.     |

Deletes a ticket type by its ID.

Request Body

| Name | Type   | Required | Description                         |
|------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| id   | string | Yes      | ID of the ticket type to delete.    |

get.description:
Retrieves all events associated with a specific calendar.

Parameters

| Name        | In    | Type   | Required | Description                             |
|-------------|-------|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | query | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar to list events for.  |
Retrieves all person tags available in the calendar system.

Retrieves detailed information for a calendar event by its identifier.

Parameters

| Name | In    | Type   | Required | Description                             |
|------|-------|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------|
| id   | query | string | Yes      | ID of the event to look up.             |

Retrieves all people associated with a specific calendar.

Parameters

| Name        | In    | Type   | Required | Description                            |
|-------------|-------|--------|----------|----------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | query | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar to list people for. |

Retrieves all coupons associated with a specific calendar.

Parameters

| Name        | In    | Type   | Required | Description                                |
|-------------|-------|--------|----------|--------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | query | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar to list coupons for.    |

post.description:
Creates a new coupon for a specified calendar.

Request Body

| Name            | Type   | Required | Description                                          |
|-----------------|--------|----------|------------------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id     | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar to associate the coupon with.     |
| code            | string | Yes      | Unique coupon code.                                  |
| discount_amount | number | Yes      | Amount to discount in USD.                           |
| expires_at      | string | No       | Expiration in ISO 8601 (UTC).                        |

Updates properties of an existing calendar coupon.

Request Body

| Name            | Type   | Required | Description                            |
|-----------------|--------|----------|----------------------------------------|
| id              | string | Yes      | ID of the coupon to update.            |
| code            | string | No       | New unique coupon code.                |
| discount_amount | number | No       | Updated discount amount in USD.        |
| expires_at      | string | No       | New expiration in ISO 8601 (UTC).      |

Imports multiple people into a specified calendar in bulk.

Request Body

| Name        | Type            | Required | Description                             |
|-------------|-----------------|----------|-----------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | string          | Yes      | ID of the calendar to import people to. |
| people      | array[object]   | Yes      | Array of person objects.                |

Creates a new tag that can be assigned to people within a specified calendar.

Request Body

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                               |
|-------------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar to scope the tag.      |
| name        | string | Yes      | Name of the new person tag.               |

Updates the name of an existing person tag within a calendar.

Request Body

| Name | Type   | Required | Description                         |
|------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| id   | string | Yes      | ID of the person tag to update.     |
| name | string | Yes      | New name for the person tag.        |

Deletes an existing person tag by its ID.

Request Body

| Name | Type   | Required | Description                     |
|------|--------|----------|---------------------------------|
| id   | string | Yes      | ID of the person tag to delete. |

Adds an existing event to a specified calendar.

Request Body

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                               |
|-------------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar.                       |
| event_id    | string | Yes      | ID of the event to add.                   |

Assigns an existing person tag to a specific person within a calendar.

Request Body

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                                  |
|-------------|--------|----------|----------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar where the tag is applied. |
| tag_id      | string | Yes      | ID of the person tag to apply.               |
| person_id   | string | Yes      | ID of the person to assign the tag to.       |

Removes an assigned person tag from a specific person within a calendar.

Request Body

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                                    |
|-------------|--------|----------|------------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar from which to remove tag.   |
| tag_id      | string | Yes      | ID of the person tag to remove.                |
| person_id   | string | Yes      | ID of the person from whom the tag is removed. |

Removes an assigned person tag from a specific person within a calendar.

Request Body

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                                    |
|-------------|--------|----------|------------------------------------------------|
| calendar_id | string | Yes      | ID of the calendar from which to remove tag.   |
| tag_id      | string | Yes      | ID of the person tag to unapply.               |
| person_id   | string | Yes      | ID of the person from whom the tag is removed. |

get.description: Retrieves information about the currently authenticated user.

Retrieves detailed information for a specified entity by its ID.

Parameters

| Name | In    | Type   | Required | Description                   |
|------|-------|--------|----------|-------------------------------|
| id   | query | string | Yes      | ID of the entity to look up.  |

post.description:
Generates a pre-signed URL for uploading a file directly to storage.

Request Body

| Name       | Type   | Required | Description                      |
|------------|--------|----------|----------------------------------|
| file_name  | string | Yes      | Name of the file to be uploaded. |

get.description:
Retrieves detailed information for an entity based on its slug identifier.

Parameters

| Name | In    | Type   | Required | Description                         |
|------|-------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| slug | query | string | Yes      | Slug identifier of the entity.      |

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug identifier of the entity to look up.

post.description:
Generates a pre-signed URL for uploading an image to be used in the Luma system.

Request Body

| Name         | Type           | Required | Description                                               |
|--------------|----------------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| purpose      | string         | Yes      | Intended use of the uploaded image (allowed: event-cover).|
| content_type | string or null | No       | MIME type (e.g., image/jpeg). If null, server may infer.  |

LumaApiKey.name: x-luma-api-key
LumaApiKey.description: Authenticate by including your API key in the x-luma-api-key header.

TooManyRequests.description: Too Many Requests  rate limit exceeded (blocked for 1 minute)

Retry-After.description: Seconds until you may retry the request.

location.description: Location identifier. Recommended: Google Maps Place ID.

EventCreateRequest.description: The complete schema is not provided. Typical fields include `name`, `start_time` (ISO 8601 UTC), `duration` (ISO 8601 duration), `location` (Google Place ID), etc.

guest_id.description: ID of the guest to update. Likely required; see full API reference.

event_id.description: ID of the event (if required by your integration).

content_type.description: MIME type (e.g., image/jpeg). If null, server may infer.

headers.description: Any additional headers required for the upload request.
